pattern: d2 $ nToOrbit $ modNote 4 (#orbit 3) $ every 3 (modNote 1 (cap 0.2 0.3 )) $off 0.5 ((#s "<ssg0 gen4 nkit2>").(#orbit 3)) $slow (3.5/3) $ n "0 ~ 1 <~ 0>  <~ { 3, 0} >[<3 [3 3]> <[2 ~] 1?>] <~ 2 [<1 ~> 1?]>" #s "nkit0" #end 1 #comp 0.5 #shape 0.5  #comp 0.5 #pan "0.0" # sirenChan 1

d1 $ modNote 0 (#lpf 1200) $nToOrbit $ every 4 (#hall 0.1) $ chop 1  $ slow (3.5/3) $ n "0 < ~ ~ 0 ~> 1 0  [~ 1] <~ 0 0 0 0> <  [ <0 ~> [3 3]] [ 1 3]>  " #s (stack [ "jp0"])  #end 0.5 #gain 1 #n "3" #speed "< 1>" #shape 0.5 #pan "0.0" # sirenChan 0

d2 $ nToOrbit $ modNote 4 (#orbit 3) $ off 0.5 ((#cut 1).(#s "<monobass bass2 bass2 [monobass monopad] >").(#orbit 4).(#pan 0.5).(#shape 0.3)) $slow (3.5/3) $ n "0 ~ 1 <~ 0>  <~ { 3, 0} >[<3 [3 3]> <[2 ~] 1?>] <~ 2 [<1 ~> 1?]>" #s "nkit0" #end 1 #comp 0.5 #shape 0.5  #comp 0.5 #pan "0.0" # sirenChan 1
